price: Sisi tunakusimulia khabari zao kwa kweli. Hakika wao walikuwa ni vijana walio muamini Mola wao Mlezi. Na Sisi tukawazidisha uwongofu.
arabic: نَّحۡنُ نَقُصُّ عَلَيۡكَ نَبَأَهُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ إِنَّهُمۡ فِتۡيَةٌ ءَامَنُواْ بِرَبِّهِمۡ وَزِدۡنَٰهُمۡ هُدٗى
footnotes: Ewe Mtume! Sisi tunakusimulia khabari zao kweli kweli: Hakika hao walikuwa vijana katika zama zilizo pita ambao walikuwa wameshika Dini ya Haki. Walimuamini Mola wao Mlezi kuwa ni Mmoja tu, na ilihali wamezungukwa na washirikina.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: naḥnu naquṣṣu ʿalayka naba-ahum bil-ḥaqi innahum fit'yatun āmanū birabbihim wazid'nāhum hudan
